title: Light
content:
mmediately. For any non-summon spell that lasts until Long Rest, the caster does not need to be in your party once you leave camp as long as the spell does not require concentration. Therefore, you can easily cast this spell on any party members you plan to use while leaving the caster back in camp. Differences from D&D 5th Edition: In 5E, light lasts for an hour, which would equate to 600 Turns
